product_name: prAna Stretch Zion Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: Put the 30 in. inseam prAna Stretch Zion pants to the test on your next climbing trip or globe-trotting adventure. Nylon/spandex fabric resists abrasion and has an all-weather finish to help shed moisture; fabric dries quickly when wet. Double-thick panels on the knees and rear hem ensure long-lasting wear in the outdoors. Feature 2 front hand pockets and 2 rear pockets (right rear pocket has a flap for added security); zippered cargo pocket on the left secures trail essentials. Pant legs roll up and secure in place with snaps. Inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion; ventilation holes help maintain comfort in warm weather. prAna Stretch Zion pants have an integrated webbing belt that fine-tunes the fit.
short_description: Put the 30 in. inseam prAna Stretch Zion pants to the test on your next climbing trip or globe-trotting adventure.
